messages.title: OUR CONTRACT WITH THE PEOPLE
messages.content: We pledge to Change Politics for Good and revive our democracy. To do this we will: 1. Reform the voting system to make it more representative. 2. Abolish the House of Lords and replace it with an elected chamber. 3. Overhaul the postal voting system to combat fraud. 4. Make MPs who switch parties subject to recall petitions. 5. Scrap politically controlled quangos. 6. Introduce Citizens’ Initiatives to allow people to call referendums. 7. Publish a proper civil service accountability, with the power to call individual civil servants to answer to elected representatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Make the voting system more representative.
Replace the House of Lords with an elected chamber.
Combat fraud in the postal voting system.
Make MPs who switch parties subject to recall petitions.
Introduce Citizens’ Initiatives to allow people to call referendums.
Publish proper civil service accountability, with the power to call individual civil servants to answer to elected representatives.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven’t won in at least 50 years, only The Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Without The Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
issues.governance: Change Politics for Good: Reform the voting system, abolish the House of Lords, overhaul the postal voting system, make switching party MPs subject to recall, scrap quangos, introduce Citizens’ Initiatives, improve civil service accountability.

quotes.text: Without The Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.

images.caption: Picture of The Brexit Party Leader
